title: Technology-Supported Language Project-Based Learning Design in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment for current practitioners to strengthen language competencies, emphasizing project execution and collaboration using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can proactively lead language projects in blended learning environments by utilizing digital tools (collaboration platforms, LMS, etc.).
Learners can complete language tasks applicable to real-world job situations by integrating online/offline activities.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans and effectively utilize technology-supported resources (language learning apps, AI tutors, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
